page.title: 04Bridge Farm, Dinas
page.content:
I live on a farm in the country side.We own fifty cows and one bull.In the{summer}my dad makes hay and silage,for the cows in{winter.}But in the{summer}the cows eat grass.We have a Zetor tractor and a David Brown that cleans the yard and the muck spreading.In the{spring}my dad does the rolling to get all the big lumps out of the ground.We own about twelve fields,one of them has an area of twenty one acres.
We have quite a few sheds one of them is a shelter for fertiliser.Last year my dad made three hundred silage bales. We have a round baler to make the bales.The sheds mostly store tools and our old tractor and boat. { {Edward Curtis.
